txt.en: This sleek and smooth wolf-pelt shimmers somewhat in your hands, making you wonder if it, like everything else in this wood, is somehow enchanted.\n\nRegardless, the Rangers of the Grey Company will wish to know that wolves are a threat to them in the Gloomglens.

'Wolves. Minor servants of the Enemy they are, corrupted hounds of ages past now turned to evil.\n\n'Nevertheless, we have dealt with our fair share of the brutes, and a few more will not be an impediment to our quest.'
'Did you find anything during your patrol of the Gloomglens?'
You slew a wolf in the Gloomglens and harvested its fine pelt.
Talk to a Ranger at Echad Idhrenfair
There are Rangers at Echad Idhrenfair in the Gloomglens.\n\nYou should bring the wolf-pelt you harvested as evidence of the threats the Grey Company might face in the Gloomglens.
